title: Definition of Independence
text: If A and B are independent, then $$P(A|B)=P(A)$$ and P(A AND $$B)=P(A)P(B)$$.

title: Application of Independence
text: If we let A $$=$$ the member is a novice swimmer and B $$=$$ the member practices four times per week, what is P(A AND B)?

title: Application of Independence
text: What is $$P\left(A\right) P\left(B\right)$$, or the probability that the member is a novice multiplied by the probability that the member practices four times a week?

title: Application of Independence
text: Is P(A AND B) equal to $$P\left(A\right) P\left(B\right)$$? If yes, then A and B are independent; if no, then A and B are not independent.
